Package game

Klasse Player

java.lang.Object
game.Player
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Comparable<Player>
public class Player extends Object implements Comparable<Player>
Represents a player in the game.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Player

      public Player(String name, boolean isHuman, int playerNo)
      Initializes a new player with the specified name, isHuman and player number.
      Parameter:
      name - The name of the player.
      isHuman - True if the player is human, false otherwise.
      playerNo - The player number.

  • Methodendetails

    • savePassedCards

      public void savePassedCards(int[] cards)
      Saves the passed cards.
      Parameter:
      cards - An array of card IDs to be saved.

    • passCards

      public void passCards(Player receivingPlayer) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Passes cards to another player.
      Parameter:
      receivingPlayer - The player receiving the cards.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the number of cards to pass is not 3.

    • resetCardsToPass

      public void resetCardsToPass()
      Resets the cards to pass. To be called at the end of a round.

    • addHandCard

      public void addHandCard(Card card) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a card to the player's hand.
      Parameter:
      card - The card to be added.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the card is already in hand or the ID is invalid.

    • addHandCard

      public void addHandCard(int cardId) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a card to the player's hand using its ID.
      Parameter:
      cardId - The ID of the card to be added.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the card is already in hand or the ID is invalid.

    • removeHandCard

      public void removeHandCard(int cardId) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Removes a card from the player's hand using its ID.
      Parameter:
      cardId - The ID of the card to be removed.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the card is not in the hand or the ID is invalid.

    • hasHandCard

      public boolean hasHandCard(Card card)
      Checks if the player has the specified card in their hand.
      Parameter:
      card - The card to check.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the player has the card, false otherwise.

    • hasClubsTwo

      public boolean hasClubsTwo()
      Checks if the player has the "Clubs 2" card in his hand.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the player has the "Clubs 2" card, false otherwise.

    • hasClubsSeven

      public boolean hasClubsSeven()
      Checks if the player has the "Clubs 7" card in their hand. Applicable when the deck size is 32.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the player has the "Clubs 7" card, false otherwise.

    • countCards

      public int countCards()
      Counts the number of cards currently in the player's hand.
      Gibt zurück:
      The count of cards in the hand.

    • countPlayableCards

      public int countPlayableCards()
      Counts the number of playable cards currently in the player's hand.
      Gibt zurück:
      The count of playable cards in the hand.

    • playCard

      public void playCard(Card card, Trick trick) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException, IllegalArgumentException
      Plays a card and adds it to the current trick.
      Parameter:
      card - The card to be played.
      trick - The trick to which the card is added.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the card is not in the hand or the ID is invalid.
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if already 4 cards have been played

    • addTrickPoints

      public void addTrickPoints(int points)
      Adds the points of a trick to the round points. Called when winning a trick.
      Parameter:
      points - The points to be added.

    • addRoundPoints

      public void addRoundPoints()
      Adds the points of a round to the game points. Called for all players at the end of a round.

    • subtractFromGamePoints

      public void subtractFromGamePoints(int subtractThisInteger)
      Subtracts a specified value from the game points. Used for Shoot the Moon.
      Parameter:
      subtractThisInteger - The value to subtract from game points.

    • resetRoundPoints

      public void resetRoundPoints()
      Resets the round points to 0.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Player otherPlayer)
      Compares players based on their game points.
      Angegeben von:
      compareTo in Schnittstelle Comparable<Player>
      Parameter:
      otherPlayer - The player to compare.
      Gibt zurück:
      A negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this player's game points are less than, equal to, or greater than the specified player's game points.

    • resetHandCards

      public void resetHandCards()
      Resets the hand cards of the player, including both regular and playable hand cards. Called at the end of a round to prepare for a new round.
